channel.title: 金融时报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪金融时报news的种子

item.title: 微软公司首席执行官萨蒂亚-纳德拉（Satya Nadella）正在下另一场赌注，以扩大这家科技巨头在生成式人工智能商业化竞赛中的优势。但 Inflection 公司的首席执行官 Mustafa Suleyman 又是何许人也？
item.description:
Microsoft chief Satya Nadella is taking another bet to extend the tech giant’s advantage in the race to commercialise generative AI. But who is Mustafa Suleyman, the chief executive of Inflection? https://t.co/yvRipGw3zo pic.twitter.com/50rZcnpzuc

— Financial Times (@FT) March 20, 2024

item.title: 即时新闻：官方数据显示，二月份英国房租成本以创纪录的速度上涨，而房价则趋于稳定。
item.description:
Breaking news: UK rental costs have risen at a record pace in February while house prices have stabilised, according to official data. https://t.co/18Cakb9UTv pic.twitter.com/KUG7nEmxDH

— Financial Times (@FT) March 20, 2024

item.title: 中国将成为减肥药物的巨大市场
item.description:
China will be a huge market for weight-loss drugs https://t.co/bo8GwGMUvj

— Financial Times (@FT) March 20, 2024

item.title: 信用卡债务已成为美国人的负担，信用卡贷款拖欠率达到近 13 年来的最高水平。这对乔-拜登今年的连任竞选构成了巨大威胁
item.description:
Credit card debt has become a burden for Americans as delinquencies on credit card loans are running at their highest level in almost 13 years.

It poses a big threat to Joe Biden’s re-election bid this yearhttps://t.co/ES6EKwyeiC pic.twitter.com/fKuQOAugMX

— Financial Times (@FT) March 20, 2024

item.title: 詹姆斯-戴森爵士是英国最成功的企业家之一，他在一系列话题上都发表过激烈的批评意见，他是英国脱欧的支持者，也是远程办公的强烈反对者，并对英国政府大加挞伐。
item.description:
Sir James Dyson, one of Britain's most successful entrepreneurs, has been a vocal critic on a range of topics, as a proponent of Brexit and a strong opponent of remote working, and has been scathing of the UK government https://t.co/I5fdaZlgaE pic.twitter.com/uADcBJjTFJ

— Financial Times (@FT) March 20, 2024

item.title: 以色列定居者伊利-费德曼（Ely Federman）被指控实施极端主义暴力，但他两周来都不知道自己已受到制裁。他正忙于在加沙作战。他的父亲诺姆声称制裁收效甚微。制裁能抑制定居者暴力的激增吗？
item.description:
For two weeks, Ely Federman, an Israeli settler accused of extremist violence, had no idea he had been sanctioned. He was busy fighting in Gaza.

His father Noam claims the sanctions have had little effect. Can they restrain a boom in settler violence? https://t.co/Ze4IstZs6O

— Polina Ivanova (@polinaivanovva) March 20, 2024

item.title: 如果您错过了它：英国通胀率降至两年多来的最低点，低于预测值，增强了交易商对英国央行降息的预期
item.description:
In case you missed it: UK inflation has fallen to its lowest in more than two years, coming in below forecasts and bolstering traders’ expectations of interest rate cuts by the Bank of England https://t.co/9vUdPoQldG pic.twitter.com/NqxI4romAa

— Financial Times (@FT) March 20, 2024

item.title: 英特尔将获 85 亿美元美国资金用于高端芯片制造
item.description:
Intel to receive $8.5bn in US funding for high-end chip manufacturing https://t.co/f1UcbD1IoO

— Financial Times (@FT) March 20, 2024

item.title: 解说：上周三，杰里米-亨特在一次简短的私人会面中告诉詹姆斯-戴森，如果他认为自己能比政府做得更好，就应该竞选议员。一位熟悉交流情况的人士说，这是一次 "可怕的会面"，另一位人士则认为这是一次 "火热的会面"。
item.description:
EXCL: Jeremy Hunt told James Dyson that he should run for parliament if he believed he could do a better job than govt during a terse private meeting last Weds

One person familiar with exchange said it was “an awful meeting”, another branded it “fiery”https://t.co/B0qg24Uo2X

— Lucy Fisher (@LOS_Fisher) March 20, 2024

item.title: 赫兹公司（Hertz）非但没有迎来繁荣，反而再次陷入困境。由于转向电动汽车的失败，这家汽车租赁公司的股价在两年内下跌了 60%。
item.description:
Instead of enjoying a boom, Hertz is in trouble again. The rental-car mainstay's shares have fallen 60% in two years, pulled down by the failure of its pivot to electric vehicles https://t.co/hWtxn9Jd7r

— Financial Times (@FT) March 20, 2024

item.title: 美国、英国和欧盟批评香港通过的新安全法，该法规定包括叛国罪在内的犯罪行为最高可判处终身监禁。
item.description:
The US, UK and EU have criticised Hong Kong’s passing of a new security law, which imposes maximum penalties of life imprisonment for crimes including treason https://t.co/lxc4pQc8Kc

item.title: 一位顶级科学顾问敦促英国招募 50 万人，帮助英国成为下一代痴呆症药物临床试验的中心。
item.description:
The UK should recruit 500,000 people to help it become a hub for clinical trials of the next generation of dementia drugs, a top scientific adviser has urged https://t.co/JNms4TSBnf

— Financial Times (@FT) March 20, 2024

item.title: 伯尼-莫雷诺是特朗普支持的俄亥俄州共和党参议员候选人，他赢得了一场备受关注的初选，将在 11 月与民主党参议员谢罗德-布朗对决。
item.description:

— Financial Times (@FT) March 20, 2024

item.description:

— Financial Times (@FT) March 20, 2024

item.title: 早上好，亚洲。当你们还在睡梦中时，我们阅读量最高的报道是关于德勤业务大改革的报道

item.title: 联邦警察建议，巴西前总统应面临刑事指控，因为有人声称他伪造了 Covid-19 疫苗证书
item.description:
The former Brazilian president should face criminal charges over claims he faked Covid-19 vaccine certificates, the federal police have recommended https://t.co/7yV0tFbCrH pic.twitter.com/SdevDA3WGj

— Financial Times (@FT) March 19, 2024
